docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Moody's 10 o'clock meeting in Cooper Union yesterday morning was attended by a larger crowd than usually goes to the forenoon services. There were as many lined up, waiting for the doors to open, as turn out in the afternoons, and the hall was just as full five minutes after the doors were opened as it has been at any time during this revival.

headline.main: SOUGHT GOD IN BOOKS; MR. MOODY'S STORY OF MANY WRETCHED PRISONERS. When the Evangelist Asked Convicts in Texas What They Wanted Most of All, They Asked for Relig- ious Pamphlets and Publi- cations.
